actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on Western Hemisphere Affairs.

official_title: A concurrent resolution declaring the support of the Congress for efforts by Latin American nations to establish a framework for dialogue and negotiation in order to resolve conflicts and to create an atmosphere of peace and mutual respect among the nations of Central America.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that there is no military solution to the conflict in Central America and that it should be the policy of the United States to support the initiatives of Latin American nations to resolve their disputes through constructive dialogue aimed at reducing tensions and promoting lasting peace.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution declaring the support of the Congress for efforts by Latin American nations to establish a framework for dialogue and negotiation in order to resolve conflicts and to create an atmosphere of peace and mutual respect among the nations of Central America.
